intro.header: Let’s find the right rosacea treatment for you.
intro.description: A personalized treatment plan that stops the redness and inflamed bumps of rosacea. Get your medication online through Zealthy, all from the comfort of your home.
listItems: Share some health information and a few photos of your skin (this will only take 5-10 minutes).
A Zealthy provider will review and write a you prescription, if appropriate.
Finally, we provide doorstep delivery and on-time refills.
Our medical team can follow up see how it’s working, and you can message any time with your questions.
